IRCDaemon.name: Raising Run IRC Channel
IRCDaemon.post: Remember to read the rules of this IRC!
This looks neat, never been on a IRC before lol.
Yeah, I just made it to be here, didn't think I would be called honestly
So, what role did you apply for?.
Security Guard is boring, I mean, nothin happens honestly.
Yep, me and Meadow always watch the cameras, nothing happens.
Yeah but I got moved to another role, I'm from Security department now so probably I'll be working with you Monroe.
Nice, I need more friends! This will be fun .
